refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a menu or a submenu in a figure

listitem.para: string character name of a property to set up
scilab object value to affect to the corresponding property
integer handle of the corresponding menu

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This allows to create menus in a figure. If parent is a figure, then the menu item will be added to the menu bar of the figure. If parent is a menu item , then the new item will be added to the parent item, allowing to create cascaded submenu. To create a customized menu, you can use the properties listed below:

listitem.para: string: allows to set up the scilab instruction to call when the item is selected by the user.
string: allows to set up the text appearing for the item.
string: this property is generally used to identify the menu. It allows to give it a "name". Mainly used in conjontion with findobj.
